public class AlgTape
extends java.lang.Object

AlgTape.java stores ordered frames of animation.

replaces current frame.

next

public AlgFrame next()
returns next frame. if frames have not been retrieved or at last frame, returns null.

prev

public AlgFrame prev()
returns previous frame. if frames have not been retrieved or at first frame, returns null.

get_last

public AlgFrame get_last()
return last frame in the sequence, and sets current frame to last.

return first frame in the sequence, and sets current frame to first.

public AlgFrame current()
return current frame

get_num_elements

public int get_num_elements()
return number of frames.

is_last

public boolean is_last()
if at least 1 frame exists, returns whether is last in sequence. else returns true.

is_first

public boolean is_first()
if at least 1 frame exists, returns whether is first in sequence. else returns true.
